name: Hungry Knight
description:
The Hungry Knight feels the urge to go on another rampage! Strike down slimes, eat cabbages and jump over spikes! Last as long as you can, until Hungry Knight gets too unmotivated to continue.

Made for a school project, submitted to GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½ since it was developed during SGDQ 2017's time period.

10/07 - HOTFIX: Fixed the file extension of the application.
